A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually stunning. RJ should stay a DP or 1st AD. Leave the writing to others. Aside from the bad character choices\, and being completely tone deaf\, at it's core it's just bad story-telling. There were a few cool moments\, but I wish JJ did this one too\, at least it would have been his complete story. This is the worst of the Skywalker Saga movies. I pray Lucasfilm never lets Rian Johnson touch anything else in the universe.
